inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: he presents with shortness of breath, chest tightening and cough. According to his mother, he didn't respond to the usual corticosteroid inhaler.

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: He was admitted to the emergency department with diagnosis of severe asthma exacerbation.
